name: Arduino-mood-light
body:
An Arduino powered moodlight.  Download the design files for a laser cut 1/4" plywood base and housing at [Thinigiverse](http://www.thingiverse.com/thing:70372)

Moodlight Modes:
1. Random Fading
2. Random Color
3. Rainbow
4. Candle
5. User Controlled
6. Full Spectrum Rainbow (HSV)
7. Off
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
